"Phantom God of Creation": "This is the end."
"Ugh!"
"Hitsugi!"
"Impossible... I sent you home, <%me>. How are you here...?"

"This is... Ame-no-Murakumo...?
It should have been destroyed, how...?"
"If it's the control of Ether, then I'm superior to this phantom God of Creation. It's as simple as that."
"Aru?! But that voice is... Mother?"
"With Aru's permission, I borrowed his body temporarily. That said, Enga Yasaka, Kohri Washinomiya... please take my hand."
"Gram!"
"My embodied weapon!"
"Though that thing is God, it's built on the framework of an embodiment using Ether from Ardem. It's not a real god."
"And so, humanity, take it down with your own strength. Gather your power, your will! Aru and I will ensure this space is not destroyed."
"Yup, I got it... So big sis, do your best!"

"As the embodiment of the Earth, the universe..
Are you truly defying me, humans?"

"You do not desire new creation, nor evolution...
You wish only to degenerate... Are you honestly
going to choose such a foolish thing?"
"You're wrong. We walk forward with our own two feet. Towards the future, tomorrow!"
"We may stumble, go back, sometimes go in the wrong direction... But we get up and keep walking forward!"
"There are many times we stop, many times we look back... We regret the mistakes we make... and sometimes we can never take them back."
"But, this way of doing things is our evolution, our way to the future."

"And we will continue walking towards
tomorrow... I won't let anyone get in our way."
"Even if that someone is God!"

"You reject the future set forth by God...
Foolish, foolish, so foolish, this is truly foolish."
"Perish, humans. Along with the Earth."

"Failure of my creation, you will be destroyed and reborn anew.
I will destroy you all, and remake you again, in my image.
This planet... this universe."
"1. The Earth is not your plaything"
"2. There's no need to recreate the Earth"
"<%me>, let's go!"
"Thank you!"
